definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
to create an issue/to cause a problem

sentences.english: Is it true that lack of iodine really causes brain damage?
sentences.chinese: 缺碘是否真的會造成腦損傷？

sentences.english: Not enough cooling power could mean heatstroke or dehydration.
sentences.chinese: 冷卻能力不足會造成中暑脫水。

sentences.english: In other words, it wreaks havoc on our memory.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，它對我們的記憶力造成了嚴重的破壞。

sentences.english: This new technology is sure to make waves in the cellular phone.
sentences.chinese: 最新的科技一定會在手機的領域中造成鬨動。

sentences.english: CCS will not be liable for any loss due to any error of the applicant or any other person.
sentences.chinese: 本社對因申請方或他人的過錯造成的損失不負責。

sentences.english: If it is caused by anaemia you might have to start taking iron tablets.
sentences.chinese: 如果是所造成的貧血，你也可能開始採取鐵片。

sentences.english: Heavy rainfall has caused water levels of the Liujiang River to rise. (ChinaFotoPress/Getty Images)
sentences.chinese: 強降雨已造成了柳江的水位上升。

sentences.english: But formaldehyde is virulent, that must do a great harm to the persons.
sentences.chinese: 因爲甲醛有劇毒，會對人體造成很大的傷害。

sentences.english: The mistake is caused by the situation today, Sheng Maolin too late to regret.
sentences.chinese: 當年的誤以爲是造成了今天的局面，盛茂林追悔莫及。

sentences.english: The global recession has hit Kumi's hometown hard.
sentences.chinese: 全球的經濟衰退給木村的家鄉造成了很大的衝擊。

sentences.english: Use of expired drugs can be dangerous for patients' health.
sentences.chinese: 使用過期藥物可能對病人的健康造成危害。

sentences.english: The anomalies of the political system have contributed to the governance crisis since the handover.
sentences.chinese: 畸型的政治制度造成迴歸後的管治危機。

sentences.english: This sequence of function calls shows you the path to the crash.
sentences.chinese: 這個函數調用序列顯示了造成崩潰的代碼路徑。

sentences.english: Repeated hitting raised a large bruise.
sentences.chinese: 反覆擊打造成一大塊青腫。

sentences.english: However, Inte can make some problems at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 然而，網絡同時也會造成一些問題。

sentences.english: Dr Sivak said this might be due to height difference between the sexes.
sentences.chinese: 西瓦克博士說，這可能是由男女身高的差異造成的。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to arise/to come into being/to come about/to give rise to/to bring into being/to bring about/to produce/to engender/to generate/to appear/appearance/emergence/generation/production/yield
to lead to/to trigger/to initiate/to cause/to evoke (emotions)
to give rise to/to lead to/to cause/to arouse
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
